content.p: The University of Nottingham will be replacing its finance, procurement and HR systems towards the end of November 2024. The systems that suppliers use will be replaced with a new Oracle Fusion system that we have named ‘UniCore’. Further information can be viewed on the UniCore webpage - select 'information for suppliers of goods and services'. King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR For queries please email procurement@nottingham.ac.uk.
